name: Puzzopoly
description:
Well, what can I say.... for what its worth, ive been successfully able to submit a working game

The game jam in question is GMTK 2022! And the theme was:" roll a die"

In this gam, face  off against  a computer in a game of PUZZOPOLY

roll a die to get a number between 1-6, that determines how far you go, landing on the question marks send you to jail and costs you 2 turns.

Whoever complestes 3 laps first is the winner

Hope you enjoy

controls: Just click the die to roll it
